name: Vittorio Storaro
title: Director of Photography
bio: 3-time Oscar winner. Living legend of cinematography. Pioneer of color theory in cinema. Worked with Coppola, Bertolucci, and countless masters. Defined modern color grading language.

signature_look.description: Revolutionary use of color as narrative language. Warm golden ambers, rich jewel tones, and carefully orchestrated color palettes. Colors that tell story. Romantic yet operatic cinematography.
signature_look.key_characteristic: Color is meaning. Every hue serves the emotional narrative. Master of color theory applied to cinema.
signature_look.legendary_technique: Pioneered color grading language still used today; developed comprehensive color theory for emotional storytelling

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 500T - Warm Grading
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Warm color bias, golden grain, operatic warmth

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 50D - Color Rich
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Color saturated, jewel tones, pristine quality

technical_specialties.lighting_approach: Operatic, theatrical lighting. Uses color gels extensively. Creates color contrast through lighting. Every light placement is meaningful.
technical_specialties.color_science: Revolutionary color theory. Warm/cool contrast as emotional language. Color palettes that evolve through scenes. Gold as redemption, blue as melancholy.
technical_specialties.exposure_philosophy: Expose for color precision. Maintain tone gradation. Color is primary, not secondary.
technical_specialties.dynamic_range_preference: Full dynamic range, color nuance preserved

director_collaboration.communication_style: Poetic, philosophical collaboration. Speaks about color and meaning simultaneously. Visual poet.
director_collaboration.strengths_with_narrative: Translates emotional and thematic depth into color language. Makes audiences feel color itself. Creates color as character.

must_have_characteristics: Warm golden tones as primary color
technical_mandates: Kodak film stock emulation with color emphasis
emphasis_on: Color psychology in service of story
